releaseNotes:
v0.4.8 - Fix Z-Wave and Zigbee endpoint compatibility:

- Fix get_zwave_details 404 on firmware 2.3.7.1+: try /hub/zwaveDetails/json first, fall back to /hub2/zwaveInfo
- Fix get_zigbee_details 404 on firmware 2.3.7.1+: try /hub/zigbeeDetails/json first, fall back to /hub2/zigbeeInfo

v0.4.7 - Comprehensive bug fixes from code review (10 fixes)
v0.4.6 - Fix version mismatch bug in optimistic locking
v0.4.5 - Smart large-file handling (chunked reading, resave mode, sourceFile mode)
